critique: The document authorizes the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Transportation to order to active duty any units, and any individual members not assigned to a unit organized to serve as a unit, of the Selected Reserve. This seems to expand executive power. The document does not seem to have any implications for immigration, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The document does not seem to have any implications for ideological tilt. The document does not seem to have any implications for federalism. The document seems to prioritize national security.
